title: Should a user buy an iPhone 12 Pro or wait for an iPhone 13? - Quora

response.answer_text: iPhone 12 is coming with a lot of hardware upgrade as compared to the older models. If you are looking for a new iPhone then 12 pro will be your best bet. Talking about iPhone 13, there are no such rumours as to when it will be launched. Cheers !!
That is such an eccentric question!! 12 hasn’t been released yet and 13 is not even conceptualised!!! Better wait for September for the 12 to release and then decide!!
